Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced ubiquitin ligase activity and increased α-synuclein aggregation in HEK293 cells expressing p.Arg249Trp.
Impaired mitochondrial function and increased oxidative stress in SH-SY5Y cells expressing p.Gly343Arg.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Ubiquitin ligase activity ≥ 80% of wild-type control

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Ubiquitin ligase activity < 50% of wild-type control

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using SH-SY5Y cells expressing PARK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced interaction between PARK2-p.Arg249Trp and α-synuclein compared to wild-type.
Decreased interaction between PARK2-p.Gly343Arg and PINK1 compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 antibody was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: IgG control was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using SH-SY5Y cells expressing PARK2 variants.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced mitochondrial membrane potential and increased ROS production in cells expressing p.Gly343Arg.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PARK2 cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial membrane potential ≥ 85% of wild-type control

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial membrane potential < 60% of wild-type control
